snippet.title: Mecho Tales - Coming Soon to PS4/PS Vita/Switch!
snippet.description:
An all-new adventure in the world of Mecho Wars! Help Little Thief and Angel navigate over brutal stages of platforming action. Shoot an army of deadly robots with 8 distinct weapons and 360 degree aim. 

Coming soon to PlayStation 4, PlayStation Vita and Nintendo Switch from Arcade Distillery!

Learn more at: https://arcadedistillery.com/mecho-tales
